name: Remedial Health
headline: B2B E-commerce & Fintech platform for Pharmacies & Hospitals in Africa
description: Remedial Health sells medicine wholesale to the 1 million pharmacies and hospitals in Africa. Today in Africa, pharmacies shop in open-air medicine markets where they pay higher prices for counterfeits medicines. We offer a managed marketplace with all the stock they'll need, deliver within 24 hours and offer credit to help them grow.

founders.name: Samuel Okwuada, Founder
founders.description: Pharmacist (Masters in pharmacy) and Software engineer (Self-taught age 14). Started 3 companies and exited 2 whilst at university. Currently the Founder and CEO of Remedial Health - improving affordability and access to medicines by providing direct to retail medical and non-medical consumables from manufacturers to pharmacies in Africa.

founders.name: Victor Benjamin, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder Remedial Health 
A salesman by passion, with a well established background of over 10years in pharma sales. My drive and strategy has earned me several awards as best salesman and distributor back to back for over 4 years at my previous work place.
I bring my experience and strategy to grow sales, increase revenue generation and geographical expansion at Remedial Health.

## Procurement & Pharmacy Operations Made Easy For Healthcare Providers.
Make all of your pharmaceutical purchases in one place (with financing options). Easy access to the African market for manufacturers.
[ ](https://remedial.health/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rhm>) [ ](https://remedial.health/<https:/apps.apple.com/ng/app/remedial-health/id1636889565>)
![home hero mobile screen](https://remedial.health/images/none-op/home-hero-4.png)
![](https://remedial.health/images/patterns/pattern-africa-gr-dark.png)
### Trusted by over 1000 Pharmacies, Patent Stores & Hospitals.

### Revolutionary Solutions For Healthcare Providers.
Simplify your procurement process and scale your pharmacy operations.

Reduce costs, paper and time spent in running your day-to-day pharmacy operations.

### Market Access
Unlock access to those who need your pharmaceutical products the most.
Learn more


![Stock up the smart way](https://remedial.health/images/none-op/stockup-img.png)
#### Central Hub For All Your Procurement Needs
### Stock up the smart way & make the most of your budget.
Purchase all your pharmaceuticals and medical products in one place, hassle-free. While at it, take advantage of our stock financing options.
  * ### Save on Spend
Benefit from the great discounts we achieve through bulk-buying and our relationship with world's top manufacturers.
  * ### Purchase With Ease
A central hub means no more administrative nightmare of dealing with numerous suppliers or visiting the market
  * ### Buy Now, Pay Later
Pay ONLY for what you dispense. Get stocks you need delivered within 24 hours and pay later. Terms and conditions apply.
  * ### Access Scarce/Rare Products
Leverage our relationship with world's top manufacturers to get whatever you need, anytime you need it.
  * ### Buy Drugs You Trust
All products come from trusted brands and vetted manufacturers. Our private label medicines are secured with anti-counterfeit Mobile Authentication Service (MAS).
  * ### Receive Stocks Faster
We serve you 24/7 and deliver your stocks within 24 hours to any part of the country. 


![African Pattern](https://remedial.health/images/patterns/pattern-africa-gr-dark.png)
![The Future of Pharmacy Is Here.](https://remedial.health/images/none-op/future-of-phar-home.png)
### The Future of Pharmacy Is Here.
Efficient business process births great customer experience. Improve your pharmacy day-to-day operations efficiencies with solutions designed by pharmacy owners for pharmacies.
[ GET THE APP NOW ](https://remedial.health/<#openGSModal>)
  * ### No More Chaos
Your pharmacy will no longer have long queues or baskets full of prescriptions with Remedial Rx simple dispensing workflow modules.
  * ### No More Scrambling
You can dispense faster as you now know the availability and exactly where anything is at any time.
  * ### No More Errors
Deliver safer, more accurate care by instantly accessing up-to-date patient information.
  * ### No More 'Out of Stock'
See what you have left in real-time and set a benchmark to automatically request new stocks from Remedial Shop before it runs out.
  * ### No More Packages on the Shelf
Immediately receive prescriptions from wards or via chats with patients and have them ready to be dispensed on-demand.
  * ### No More Paper
Retrieve and view dispensing records, stock inventory, and sales data in one place, from anywhere on your smart devices.


### Built For Health-Care Providers To Take Their Lives Back.
Improve quality of life in Africa without breaking your back or sacrificing profit margin.
  * [ ![For Pharmacy](https://remedial.health/images/cards/for-pharmacy.jpeg) ](https://remedial.health/<https:/remedial.health/solutions/buy-now-pay-later>)
### [For Pharmacies ](https://remedial.health/<https:/remedial.health/solutions/buy-now-pay-later>)
Automate daily operations. Make all purchases in one place. Stock up and pay later.
[ Learn more ](https://remedial.health/<https:/remedial.health/solutions/buy-now-pay-later>)
  * [ ![For Hospitals & Clinics](https://remedial.health/images/cards/for-hospital.jpeg) ](https://remedial.health/<https:/remedial.health/solutions/shop>)
### [For Hospitals & Clinics ](https://remedial.health/<https:/remedial.health/solutions/shop>)
Close the loop between wards, departments and pharmacies.
[ Learn more ](https://remedial.health/<https:/remedial.health/solutions/shop>)
  * [ ![For Health Insurers & HMOs](https://remedial.health/images/cards/for-health-insurance.jpeg) ](https://remedial.health/<https:/remedial.health/solutions/benefit-manager>)
### [For Health Insurers & HMOs ](https://remedial.health/<https:/remedial.health/solutions/benefit-manager>)
Improve your service delivery.
[ Learn more ](https://remedial.health/<https:/remedial.health/solutions/benefit-manager>)


![Remedial Health App Wholesale Supply Screen](https://remedial.health/images/none-op/remark-img-home.png)
### It's Time To Unlock The Future of Your Pharmacy.
Stock up your pharmacy with ease, access credit and simplify your operations.

generated_description:
**Remedial Health - Simplifying Pharmaceutical Procurement in Africa**

Founded in 2021 and proudly operating from Lagos, Nigeria, Remedial Health is a forward-thinking B2B e-commerce and fintech platform designed specifically for pharmacies and hospitals across Africa. Initially starting as a wholesale distributor of medicines to Africa's abundant landscape of 1 million health facilities, Remedial Health has evolved into a comprehensive managed marketplace. This platform not only supplies essential stock but also delivers it within 24 hours, enabling pharmacists to avoid the pitfalls of open-air markets, where counterfeits and inflated prices are rampant.

The heart of Remedial Health's mission is to empower healthcare providers by providing a streamlined, efficient, and cost-effective procurement process. Their offering includes a range of innovative solutions like the Remedial Benefits Manager, Buy Now-Pay Later options for inventory financing, and a robust data analytics service through Remedial Intelligence. These tools are tailored to remove the burdensome logistics of purchasing medications, allowing healthcare professionals to focus on what they do best—caring for patients.

With a sizeable team of 300 employees, Remedial Health has quickly gained traction, amassing a trusted clientele of over 1,000 pharmacies and hospitals, all delighted to have the convenience of accessing pharmaceuticals at their fingertips. They can avoid the traditional chaos of supply chains and streamline operations through their easy-to-use platform.

Supported by notable investors such as Y Combinator, Tencent, and QED Investors, Remedial Health stands on solid ground for future growth. They are not just about selling medications; they are about transforming how healthcare providers operate, bringing efficiency and reliability into the healthcare ecosystem.

Michael Seibel, a prominent figure in the startup community, serves as Group Partner, providing valuable mentorship to this ambitious venture. If you're looking to explore their solutions further, check out their website at [remedial.health](https://remedial.health).

In a world where healthcare is increasingly dominated by inefficiencies, Remedial Health is fostering innovation—a true lifeline for those who need it most. And if you’re in the pharmacy business in Africa, you might just find that stocking up and simplifying your operations has never been easier.
